Text:
I believe Lyd only produced a one-sided acetate, unreleased, with no track titles. The Arkarma release attribted the following titles
01 - The Time Of Hate And Struggle - 3.00
02 - Need You - 2.36
03 - Stay High, Fly Away Is Still Ok - 3.57
04 - Double Dare - 1.47
05 - Think It Over Twice - 7.23
06 - Trash Pad - 2.14
